TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStyleSheet

summary.span: 定義為了支援樣式規則的建立，類別必須實作的方法。

span.span: Defines the methods that a class must implement in order to support the creation of style rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個介面的類別可以用它來支援建立樣式規則。Classes that implement this interface can use it to support the creation of style rules. 若要自訂的階層式樣式表的建立和註冊的方式，您必須建立實作這個介面的類別。To customize the way cascading style sheets are created and registered, you must create a class that implements this interface. 類別會實作這個介面，以供透過 ASP.NET屬性。The class implements this interface for use by ASP.NET through the property. > [!NOTE] > 不支援新增或在非同步回傳期間以程式設計方式修改樣式或樣式規則。Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作示範以程式設計方式建立新的樣式規則，並註冊自訂物件。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate programmatically creating a new style rule and registering the custom object. 在此範例中，自訂的第一個部分物件`labelStyle`、 建立並再註冊目前的位置 (URL)。In the first part of the example, a custom object, `labelStyle`, is created and then registered for the current location (URL). 然後在`label1`標籤呼叫方法以便`labelStyle`樣式套用至`label1`標籤。Then the `label1` label calls the method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label. 此範例的第二個部分定義其他自訂物件`bodyStyle`，並設定其屬性，以建立新的樣式規則。The second part of the example defines another custom object, `bodyStyle`,and sets its properties to create a new style rule. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別主要被供開發人員用來建立自訂的實作。This class is intended primarily for developers that want to create a custom implementation. 此範例會示範.NET Framework 所提供的實作。This example demonstrates the implementation provided by the .NET Framework. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/CS/istylesheetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/VB/istylesheetvb.aspx#1)] 以下是上述範例中的網頁的程式碼後置檔案。The following is the code-behind file for the Web page in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/CS/istylesheetcs.aspx.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateStyleRule (System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style style, System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver, string selector);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateStyleRule(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style style, class System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver, string selector) cil managed
public: void CreateStyleRule(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ style, System::Web::UI::IUrlResolutionService ^ urlResolver, System::String ^ selector);

param.name: style
param.span: 要加入至內嵌樣式表的樣式規則。

span.span: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 實作的物件，包含目前位置 (URL) 的內容資訊。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

param.name: selector
param.span: HTML 頁面中受樣式影響的部分。

span.span: The part of the HTML page affected by the style.

summary.span: 類別實作時，建立所指定之文件語言項目型別或選取器的樣式規則。

span.span: When implemented by a class, creates a style rule for the specified document language element type, or selector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立指定的選取器的樣式規則。The method creates a style rule for the specified selector. 相同的選取器，可以建立多個樣式規則。Multiple style rules can be created for the same selector. 如果`urlResolver`設`null`，目前的 URL會使用執行個體。If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current instance is used. > [!NOTE] > 不支援新增或在非同步回傳期間以程式設計方式修改樣式或樣式規則。Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作示範定義新物件`bodyStyle`。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate defining a new object, `bodyStyle`. 然後`bodyStyle`已加入至目前 URL 之呼叫。Then `bodyStyle` is added to the current URL by calling . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule/CS/istylesheetcreatestylerulecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule/VB/istylesheetcreatestylerulevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterStyle (System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style style, System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterStyle(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style style, class System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver) cil managed

param.name: style
param.span: 要加入至內嵌樣式表的樣式規則。

span.span: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 實作的物件，包含目前位置 (URL) 的內容資訊。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

summary.span: 類別實作時，將新樣式規則加入至網頁 區段中的內嵌樣式表。

span.span: When implemented by a class, adds a new style rule to the embedded style sheet in the section of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會將新的樣式規則和內嵌的樣式表內的屬性名稱``區段物件，並將此規則以自動產生樣式的名稱產生關聯。This method adds a new style rule and property name to the embedded style sheet within the `` section of a object, and associates the rule with an auto-generated style name. 物件使用指定呈現`urlResolver`參數。The object is rendered using the specified `urlResolver` parameter. 如果`urlResolver`設`null`，目前的 URL用。If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current is used. 如果已註冊物件，它不會加入許多次。If a object is already registered, it is not added multiple times. > [!NOTE] > 不支援加入或在非同步回傳期間以程式設計方式修改樣式。Adding or modifying styles programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 當您新增 AJAX 功能 ASP.NET 網頁時，非同步回傳會更新網頁的區域，而不更新整個頁面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Microsoft Ajax 概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作示範建立自訂物件`labelStyle`，然後為目前的位置 (URL) 進行註冊。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate creating a custom object, `labelStyle`, and then registering it for the current location (URL). 然後在`label1`標籤呼叫方法以便`labelStyle`樣式套用至`label1`標籤。Then the `label1` label calls the method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle/CS/istylesheetregisterstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle/VB/istylesheetregisterstylevb.aspx#1)]
